text: Sandstorm (, , translit. Rih al-raml) is a 1982 Algerian drama movie directed by Mohammed Lakhdar-Hamina and starring Nadir Benguedih, Himmoud Brahimi, Leila Shenna, Sabrina Hannach, Albert Minski. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 drama movies Category:Algerian movies Category:Movies directed by Mohammed Lakhdar-Hamina
title: Sandstorm (1982 movie)
